description.en: indaHash - the award-winning app which connects over 300,000 influencers from 70 markets with global brands introduces the indaHash Coin. Our mission is to tokenize the entire influencer industry to solve major issues between brands, influencers and their audiences. Our cryptoeconomics implies circulation of the indaHash Coin among all of these groups and creates a new type of relationship and added value.
